edu.ncsu.csc216.garage.model.dealer

Interface Manageable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ServiceManager

    public interface Manageable
    Operations that must be supported to manage a service facility that has a list of "tiered" items awaiting service and service bays where service is delivered.
    Author:
    Jo Perry, Jason King

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addNewBay()
      Adds a new service bay to the service area.
      void fillServiceBays()
      Fills the service bays with items awaiting service.
      Tiered getWaitingItem(java.lang.String filter, int position)
      Returns the Tiered item meeting the given filter and position from the list of items awaiting service.
      java.lang.String printServiceBays()
      A string representation of the list of bays in the service area.
      java.lang.String printWaitList(java.lang.String filter)
      A string representation of the list of items awaiting service that meet the given filter.
      void putOnWaitingList(java.lang.String t, java.lang.String b, java.lang.String c, int x)
      Puts an item in the service wait list.
      void putOnWaitingList(Tiered v)
      Puts an item in the list of those awaiting service.
      Tiered releaseFromService(int bay)
      Releases the item from the given service bay.
      Tiered remove(java.lang.String filter, int position)
      Removes an item meeting the given filter from the list of items awaiting service.

    • Method Detail

      • putOnWaitingList

        void putOnWaitingList(java.lang.String t,
                      java.lang.String b,
                      java.lang.String c,
                      int x)
               throws BadVehicleInformationException
        Puts an item in the service wait list.
        Parameters:
        t - Type of item
        b - Item data (such as license)
        c - Item data (such as owner name)
        x - Item tier
        Throws:
        BadVehicleInformationException

      • putOnWaitingList

        void putOnWaitingList(Tiered v)
        Puts an item in the list of those awaiting service.
        Parameters:
        v - The item to put on waiting list

      • getWaitingItem

        Tiered getWaitingItem(java.lang.String filter,
                      int position)
        Returns the Tiered item meeting the given filter and position from the list of items awaiting service.
        Parameters:
        filter - Filters the list of items considered
        position - Position in the filtered list of items
        Returns:
        The item at the position in the list that meets the given filter

      • remove

        Tiered remove(java.lang.String filter,
              int position)
        Removes an item meeting the given filter from the list of items awaiting service.
        Parameters:
        filter - Filters the list of items considered for removal
        position - Position in the filtered list of the item to be removed
        Returns:
        The item that was removed, or null if nothing was removed

      • fillServiceBays

        void fillServiceBays()
        Fills the service bays with items awaiting service.

      • releaseFromService

        Tiered releaseFromService(int bay)
        Releases the item from the given service bay.
        Parameters:
        bay - Location of the bay where the item is being serviced
        Returns:
        Item that was released from service, or null if the bay was empty

      • addNewBay

        void addNewBay()
        Adds a new service bay to the service area.

      • printWaitList

        java.lang.String printWaitList(java.lang.String filter)
        A string representation of the list of items awaiting service that meet the given filter.
        Parameters:
        filter - Determines which items are are of interest
        Returns:
        String String representation of the filtered list

      • printServiceBays

        java.lang.String printServiceBays()
        A string representation of the list of bays in the service area.
        Returns:
        String representation of the service area
